attributes.review: I downloaded the app to see when the next rallyâ€™s would be and stuff. When I opened the app it showed me a picture of a dog in the middle of pooping! My eyes then refused to look at my phone so I turned my phone off. Later that day I decided to give the app another shot. So once again I opened the app and this time there was no picture. There was just this random game that popped up on my screen and it would not let me leave the app, turn my phone off, or shut it down! So at that point I was panicking so I decided to play the game. The game was brick and balls and I just played the first level and then the same picture of a dog pooping popped up on my screen! So now the app was letting my turn the app off so I left the app and immediately deleted it. DO NOT download this app it is a waste of time and not worth it!!!!!!!

attributes.review: I understand if you have confidence in yourself. But this just feels like too much. My boyfriend downloaded this onto my phone since he is a supporter. I tried to keep an open mind so I didnâ€™t think much of it. However, when I went into the app, it was a hypothetical slap in the face. I felt I was just being bombarded with trump everything. Which is to be expected when you get an app about someone. But my thoughts were that it was going to be news on his campaign, maybe some plans he had to help with the immigrant kids, the onslaught of the global pandemic. But what I got was something completely and utterly different. If you want to get an app that shows that our president who is a narcissistic person then get this on. But if youâ€™re looking for news and simple other things look far, far elsewhere.
